00035 #define ABS(x) ((x) < 0 ? -(x) : (x))
00036 
00037 
00038 int triangle(int jf, int k, int ji)
00039 {
00040   if (ABS(ji-k) <= jf && jf <= ji+k)
00041     return 1;
00042   else
00043     return 0;
00044 }
00045

00047 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00048 {
00049   createinfo(argc, argv);
00050 
00051 #ifdef MPI
00052   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00053   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00054   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00055 
00056   // fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00057 
00058   if (mpirank != 0) {
00059     OneNucleonOvlapsSlave();
00060   } else {
00061 #endif
00062 
00063   // enough arguments ?
00064 
00065   if (argc < 2) {
00066     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] J,Pi,IDX,MBSTATE J,Pi,IDX,MBSTATE"
00067             "\n     -q QMAX         calculate to max momentum"
00068             "\n     -n NPOINTS      number of points"
00069             "\n     -p NALPHA-NBETA number of angles"
00070             "\n     -r              recoil\n",
00071             argv[0]);
00072     exit(-1);
00073   }
00074 
00075   // spectroscopic amplitude parameters
00076 
00077   int npoints = 51;
00078   double qmax = 5.0;
00079   int nalpha = 5;
00080   int ncosb = 4;
00081   int recoil = 0;
00082 
00083   // project to this states
00084   int jA, pA, aA;
00085   int jB, pB, aB;
00086 
00087   /* manage command-line options */
00088 
00089   char* projparas;
00090 
00091   char c;
00092   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "q:n:p:r")) != -1)
00093     switch (c) {
00094     case 'q':
00095       qmax = atof(optarg);
00096       break;
00097     case 'n':
00098       npoints = atoi(optarg);
00099       break;
00100     case 'p':
00101       projparas = optarg;
00102       char* ang = strtok(projparas, "-");
00103       nalpha = atoi(ang);
00104       ang = strtok(NULL, "-");
00105       ncosb = atoi(ang);
00106       break;
00107     case 'r':
00108       recoil = 1;
00109       break;
00110     }
00111 
00112   char* Aparas = argv[optind];
00113   char* Bparas = argv[optind+1];
00114 
00115   char* p = strtok(Aparas, ",");
00116   jA = atoi(p);
00117   p = strtok(NULL, ",");
00118   pA = (*p == '+' ? 0 : 1);
00119   p = strtok(NULL, ",");
00120   aA = atoi(p);
00121   p = strtok(NULL, ",");
00122   char* mcAstatefile = p;
00123 
00124   p = strtok(Bparas, ",");
00125   jB = atoi(p);
00126   p = strtok(NULL, ",");
00127   pB = (*p == '+' ? 0 : 1);
00128   p = strtok(NULL, ",");
00129   aB = atoi(p);
00130   p = strtok(NULL, ",");
00131   char* mcBstatefile = p;

00133   // open multiconfigfiles
00134   Projection PA;
00135   Projection PB;

00147   char** mbAfile;
00148   if (readMulticonfigfile(mcAstatefile, &mbAfile, &PA, 
00149                           &QA, &SA, &EA, &nA)) {
00150     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", mcAstatefile);
00151     exit(-1);
00152   }
00153 
00154   char** mbBfile;
00155   if (readMulticonfigfile(mcBstatefile, &mbBfile, &PB, 
00156                           &QB, &SB, &EB, &nB)) {
00157     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", mcBstatefile);
00158     exit(-1);
00159   }
00160 
00161   // PA and PB should be identical besides of odd !
00162   Projection P = PB;
00163 
00164 
00165   OneNucleonOvlapsPara SAP = {
00166     qmax : qmax,
00167     npoints : npoints,
00168     nalpha : nalpha,
00169     ncosb : ncosb,
00170     recoil : recoil
00171   };
00172 
00173 #ifdef MPI
00174   int task=TASKSTART;
00175   BroadcastTask(&task);
00176 
00177   BroadcastOneNucleonOvlapsPara(&SAP);
00178   BroadcastA(&QB->A);
00179 #endif
00180 
00181 
00182   int i;
00183   int a,b;
00184 
00185   // which spectroscopic amplitudes are possible ?
00186 
00187   int multi[NSPEC] = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
00188 
00189   fprintf(stderr, "jA: %d, pA: %d\n", jA, pA);
00190   fprintf(stderr, "jB: %d, pB: %d\n", jB, pB);
00191 
00192   if (pB == pA && triangle(jA, 1, jB))
00193     multi[0] = 1;
00194 
00195   if (pB != pA && triangle(jA, 1, jB))
00196     multi[1] = 1;
00197 
00198   if (pB != pA && triangle(jA, 3, jB))
00199     multi[2] = 1;
00200 
00201   if (pB == pA && triangle(jA, 3, jB))
00202     multi[3] = 1;
00203 
00204   if (pB == pA && triangle(jA, 5, jB))
00205     multi[4] = 1;
00206 
00207 
00208   initOpOneNucleonOvlaps(&SAP);
00209 
00210   void* specamplitudeme[NSPEC][nA*nB];
00211 
00212   // read or calculate matrix elements
00213 
00214   int havetocalc;
00215 
00216   for (b=0; b<nB; b++)
00217     for (a=0; a<nA; a++) {
00218 
00219       for (i=0; i<NSPEC; i++) 
00220         specamplitudeme[i][a+b*nA] = 
00221           initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOneNucleonOvlap[i]);
00222 
00223       havetocalc = 0;
00224       for (i=0; i<NSPEC; i++)
00225         if (multi[i])
00226           if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbAfile[a], mbBfile[b], &P,
00227                                         &OpOneNucleonOvlap[i], 
00228                                         SA[a], SB[b],
00229                                         specamplitudeme[i][a+b*nA]))
00230             havetocalc = 1;
00231 
00232       if (havetocalc) {
00233         void* me[NSPEC];
00234         for (i=0; i<NSPEC; i++)
00235           me[i] = specamplitudeme[i][a+b*nA];
00236 
00237 #ifdef MPI
00238         calcprojectedMBMEsmpi(&P, &OpOneNucleonOvlaps, &QA[a], &QB[b],
00239                               SA[a], SB[b], me);
00240 #else
00241         calcprojectedMBMEs(&P, &OpOneNucleonOvlaps, &QA[a], &QB[b],
00242                            SA[a], SB[b], me);
00243 #endif
00244         for (i=0; i<NSPEC; i++)
00245           writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbAfile[a], mbBfile[b], &P, 
00246                                    &OpOneNucleonOvlap[i], SA[a], SB[b], 
00247                                    specamplitudeme[i][a+b*nA]);
00248       }
00249     }
00250 
00251 
00252   void* specamplitude[NSPEC];
00253 
00254   for (i=0; i<NSPEC; i++)   
00255     if (multi[i]) {
00256       specamplitude[i] = 
00257         initprojectedtransitionVector(&P, &OpOneNucleonOvlap[i], nA, nB);
00258       calctransitionprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOneNucleonOvlap[i], 
00259                                   specamplitudeme[i], 
00260                                   SA, SB, &EA, &EB, specamplitude[i]);
00261     }
00262 
00263   // output
00264 
00265   char outfile[255];
00266 
00267   snprintf(outfile, 255, "%s-%s.%d-%s-%s.%d.onenucleonovlaps", 
00268            stripstr(mcAstatefile, ".states"), AngmomtoStr(jA, pA), aA,
00269            stripstr(mcBstatefile, ".states"), AngmomtoStr(jB, pB), aB);
00270 
00271   // write spectroscopic factors to data files
00272 
00273   for (i=0; i<NSPEC; i++)
00274     if (multi[i]) {
00275       int j,l;
00276       switch(i) {
00277       case 0:
00278         j=1; l=0;
00279         break;
00280       case 1:
00281         j=1; l=2;
00282         break;
00283       case 2:
00284         j=3; l=2;
00285         break;
00286       case 3:
00287         j=3; l=4;
00288         break;
00289       case 4:
00290         j=5; l=4;
00291         break;
00292       }
00293       
00294       char datafile[255];
00295       FILE *datafp;
00296 
00297       snprintf(datafile, 255, "%s-%d-%d--%05.2f-%d-%d-%d%s.data", 
00298                outfile, j, l,
00299                qmax, npoints, nalpha, ncosb, recoil ? "-recoil" : "");
00300       if (!(datafp = fopen(datafile, "w"))) {
00301         fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", datafile);
00302         exit(-1);
00303       }
00304 
00305       writeOneNucleonOvlaps(datafp, 
00306                             &P, &SAP,
00307                             jA, pA, aA,
00308                             jB, pB, aB,
00309                             specamplitude[i],
00310                             &EA, &EB);
00311       fclose(datafp);
00312     }
00313 
00314   cleanup:
00315 #ifdef MPI
00316   task=TASKFIN;
00317   BroadcastTask(&task);
00318   }
00319 
00320   MPI_Finalize();
00321 #endif
00322 
00323   return 0;
